website_summaries.verdict: One of the few subwoofer options that combine a budget price with the capability of higher power output.
pros: Decent frequency response and power output given the price tag
Will be a good upgrade for factory-installled, base trim audio systems that fail to provide the volume needed for car use
cons: Construction quality is subpar compared to other, more expensive subwoofers

customer_reviews.title: Great budget subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: Decent subwoofer for the $$$. I put 8 of these in a transmission line enclosure, powered by 1200 watts. They get LOUD....I'm definitely not disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Blew after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: My sub blew after about 3 months of using it. The sound quality was pretty good when it worked. I had replaced my previous Planet Audio 8in sub with this one. This one sounded much better than the Planet Audio. I gave up on 8 inch subs and went with a Kicker 12 inch. BIG sound difference. Spend the extra money on a 12 inch. There's not a big price difference and the space savings are almost non existent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good. I replaced my Challenger's factor 8 inch subwoofer with this one as a cheap alternative and it sounds good. It is being powered off the factory amp so its not super loud but my car stereo has a nice rich bass tone to it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Amazed at the bass this sub puts out. In the right box, it pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Cacador

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sub!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old Sony unit with this. Intstallation was straightforward and sound quality is just fantastic! I can hear much more lows and it definitely kicks! All in all a good unit!
customer_reviews.author: TechGReviews

customer_reviews.title: Just ain't what they use to be
customer_reviews.text: Blaupunkt disappoints. Paired this with a Blaupunkt amp and proper box and speaker froze after 3 months. replaced it with a Kicker and still going strong. You get what you pay for when its cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Furst

customer_reviews.title: Used as replacement for Bose 143443 P
customer_reviews.text: Used to replace the woofer in our old Bose Acustimass that we bought in 1995, original part #143443 P. Perfect fit, even the bolt pattern lined up. We only transferred the fiber mounting pad/insulator from the old speaker to the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Tom L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for factory subwoofer.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit to replace factory subwoofer in rear deck on Lexus’ and Toyota’s that are equipped... with a little DIY experience it should be a pretty easy job for you!!
customer_reviews.author: Todd B.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: sounded good when new. voice coil failed after about a month.
customer_reviews.author: tony spinks

customer_reviews.title: Good Speaker For The Price
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews, it seems this speaker works well as a sub, but I am using it as a mid-bass, with a cut off at 2 KHz. Nice and clean sound in this range. Only issue I have is the mild steel stamped frame. Both speakers I ordered had small bends in the mounting flange, which I was able bend back into shape with my fingers. However, once mounted, no problem. This speaker is a great value, IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: I had to make a special mounting to fit original place in my Lexus. Quality of build and sound quality is really good. High volumes not needed, but adds the perfect amount of bass to the rest of the system. Although I use it on low pass filter, I have tried it full range and it also performed very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great OEM Replacement!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this subwoofer as a replacement for the factory sub in my 2002 Chevy Tahoe. Speaker fit perfectly without modification (aside from drilling 4 new mounting holes). The fit was tight and required working with a rubber mallet but not a difficult install. Sound is a HUGE improvement over the stock speaker. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan F.

customer_reviews.title: Budget bangers
customer_reviews.text: I put 4 8s in a 2cf ported box tuned to 35hz. Powered by a skar rp1200. The subs hit hard, great value. Installed in an 2016 f150 supercrew.
customer_reviews.author: Marichu V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small sub but works well in the factory enclosure in the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Rob M

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: The best speakers, they sound so great in my truck and plenty of bass
customer_reviews.author: DJ

product_meta.title: Blaupunkt 8-Inch Single Voice Coil Subwoofer with 400W Power
product_meta.description:
The Blaupunkt 8" Single Voice Coil Subwoofer with 400W Power (GBW801) provides the perfect base tone for your car audio. Made with the highest technical quality to ensure maximum reliability and durability. This 8" car audio subwoofer features a 2" high-temperature aluminum voice coil for the best audio, as well as a high-density foam surround to prevent vibrations to surrounding materials. The GBW801 has a maximum power handling of 400 watts and an RMS power handling of 200 watts. 

High-Quality Polypropylene Cone
High-Density Foam Surround
2” High-Temperature Aluminum Voice Coil
Power Output (RMS): 200 Watts
Power Output (Peak): 400 Watts
Frequency Response: 45Hz – 2KHz
Impedance: 4 Ohm
Sensitivity: 88dB, 1W/M
In the Box: GBW801 Subwoofer and Accessories
feature_bullets: 8-Inch Single Voice Coil Subwoofer with 400W Power
Made with the highest technical quality to ensure maximum reliability and durability
MAX power handling 400 watts (400 Watts Peak) and an RMS power handling of 200 watts (400 Watts Peak)
Features a 2" high-temperature aluminum voice coil for the best audio, as well as a high-density foam surround to prevent vibrations to surrounding materials

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars28 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
